notes: B2B roaming and clearing platform with marketplace contracts and operational support for EV charging.
Intercharge eRoaming network connecting CPO and EMP participants across many countries.
Roaming platform with explicit OCPI and OCHP support for operators and mobility providers.
White label and open source CPMS with roaming support through major hubs and OCPI payment terminal claims.
End to end EV charging platform with roaming capabilities and software for operators and solution providers.
Gateway product for secure OCPI integrations with direct peers or hubs and deployment options on premise or cloud.
Transaction broker for OCPI roaming with peer to peer agreements plus technical and financial clearing products.
Charge point management platform with direct OCPI integrations and roaming hub partnerships.
OCPI feature set supporting roaming as CPO or eMSP with NAP compliance workflows.
EV charging management platform with OCPI-enabled roaming and support for data exchange billing and smart charging workflows.
Driivz platform states production support for hundreds of OCPI 2.2.1 connections and roaming workflows.
Charging platform and roaming services provider with long-standing OCPI implementation and CPO or MSP offerings.
Virta Hub supports OCPI 2.2.1 for peer-to-peer roaming between charging networks and service providers.
GreenFlux operates large scale roaming with OCPI and reports hundreds of active OCPI connections.
Paua provides UK focused fleet charging payments and roaming and documents OCPI based interoperability with CPO partners.
Plugsurfing offers Roam OCPI as a managed roaming connection to a large European charging network.
Electra is referenced as an ENAPI partner for OCPI based roaming expansion while direct public OCPI technical details remain limited.
Company documentation states the back-end software is OCPI ready and supports roaming integrations with partner networks.
Company page describes OCPP and OCPI compliant network management with multi network roaming capabilities.
Company page describes a private roaming gateway and explicit support for OCPI 2.2.1 and 2.3.0.
Company blog describes an OCPI 2.2.1 based Nayax payment terminal integration for charger and kiosk deployment modes.
Company page states roaming interoperability with GIREVE and Hubject and support for OCPI and OICP protocols.
Company blog describes Cloud-Connect payment integration for EV charging based on OCPI 2.2.1 including direct payment workflows.
Company announcement describes an OCPI 2.2.1 direct payment compliant terminal for public charging and AFIR aligned deployments.
